packageActions.label: New Focus Area...
packageActions.description: Create a new focus area with its own properties and records for the current analysis package.

packageActions.label: Refresh Package Content
packageActions.description: Reload the data for the currently selected analysis package.

packageActions.label: Show Deleted Content
packageActions.description: Toggle visibility of any soft-deleted records for the selected analysis package.

packageActions.label: Edit Package Header
packageActions.description: View or edit the analysis package's name, summary, or long description.

packageActions.label: Remove Package
packageActions.description: Deletes the package by marking is_deleted=1
